name: OP: Captain and the Warlords
description:
Mighty warriors, champions of peace
Flame and smoke on the seas again! Fight alongside the strongest warriors, breach enemy defense and protect the peace of the world!

Magical fusion, instant power boost
Endless challenges in your adventure, try fuse heroes and gears, see your power soar beyond the limit!

Collect resources, claim the fabled treasures
The more stages you clear, the more time on idle, the greater the rewards you gain! Free your hands and protect your wallet!

Smart formation, dominate the battlefield!
Battlefields are precarious and full of perils. Employ intricate strategies and flexible tactics, crush the enemy and rise to the top!
